availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew J. Mundy (Todd County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Martha Munday. Father to Elizabeth F. Munday, Calpernia Munday, A. D. Munday, Mary E. Munday, John Y. Munday, and Nancy S. Munday. Farmer in Todd County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Todd County in 1860. Farmer in Todd County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 2, p. 268A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 813.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, Sharon, p. 436A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Todd County, KY, February 1864, p. 100.
"Andrew Jack Munday (1822-1894)," Find A Grave, Memorial #84514020, accessed September 22, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84514020.
